AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Combo Discount Type List
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (VALUE='COMBOFIXPRICE' AND (SELECT M_OFFER_TYPE_ID FROM M_OFFER WHERE M_OFFER_ID=@M_Offer_ID@)='71895FA82C9645949CB752564FB1389D') OR (VALUE IN('FIXDISC','PERCENTAGE','FIXPRICE') AND (SELECT M_OFFER_TYPE_ID FROM M_OFFER WHERE M_OFFER_ID=@M_Offer_ID@)='7899A7A4204749AD92881133C4EE7A57')
